synopsis.text: Following the National Middle School Tennis Tournament, young tennis sensation Ryouma Echizen embarks on a journey to the United States to enhance his skills and uncover the enigmatic circumstances surrounding his father's retirement from professional tennis. Known as 'Samurai Nanjiro,' Ryouma's father was a legendary tennis player whose career came to an abrupt end after the US Open finals several years ago. Ryouma's quest to fill the gaps in his understanding of his father's final match leads him to an unexpected supernatural phenomenon that transports him and his classmate, Sakuno Ryuzaki, back in time to the very event. As the mystery deepens with the involvement of the mafia, Ryouma must rise to the challenge and do everything in his power to unravel the truth behind his father's retirement and prevent it from happening. Set between the events of the original manga and its ongoing sequel, this film brings the vibrant world of The Prince of Tennis to life with innovative 3D digital animation, inviting viewers to sing, dance, and play along.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
